      Parameters:
      id - Company id.
      Returns:

      Parameters:
      id - : The id of the company.
      objectName - : The name of the object.
      Returns:

    • deleteDocument

      @DeleteMapping("/document/{id}/{objectName}") @Produces("text/plain") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Boolean> deleteDocument(@PathVariable("id") UUID id, @PathVariable("objectName") String objectName, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)

      Parameters:
      id - The id of the company.
      objectName - The name of the object.
      Returns:
